Over the years, our students have gone to several MUN conferences, all around the world.

Special shoutout to these two conferences, that inspired us to create ILYMUN:

Impact Summit

International MUN, end of September in Prague

HMUN

April conference in Haarlem, The Netherlands

TIMUN
